Actions.Text: tell application "System Events"	tell application process "Finder"		return count of windows	end tellend tell

ElseActions.Text: -- Requires Keyboard Maestro 8.0.3+set kmInst to system attribute "KMINSTANCE"tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine"	set kmPath to getvariable "local__Path" instance kmInstend tell-- Expand tilde (~) Pathstell application "System Events"	set thePP_Path to POSIX path of disk item kmPathend tell-- Convert POSIX path to Macintosh path (path delimited with colons)set theA_Path to POSIX file thePP_Path as stringtell application "Finder"	set newWin to make new Finder window	tell newWin		set its target to theA_Path		if toolbar visible ≠ true then set toolbar visible to true		if its current view ≠ list view then set its current view to list view	end tellend tell

ThenActions.Text: -- Requires Keyboard Maestro 8.0.3+set kmInst to system attribute "KMINSTANCE"tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine"	set kmPath to getvariable "local__Path" instance kmInstend tell-- Expand tilde (~) Pathstell application "System Events"	set thePP_Path to POSIX path of disk item kmPathend tell-- Convert POSIX path to Macintosh path (path delimited with :'s)set theA_Path to POSIX file thePP_Path as string-- "Try" is used, because the setting of "theFrontWindowPath" fails if the active Finder tab is a Smart Foldertry	tell application "Finder"		activate		tell front window			if toolbar visible ≠ true then set toolbar visible to true			if its current view ≠ list view then set its current view to list view			set theFrontWindowPath to POSIX path of (target of it as text)		end tell	end tell	if thePP_Path & "/" is theFrontWindowPath then		return 1	else		return 0	end ifon error	return 0end try

ElseActions.Text: -- Requires Keyboard Maestro 8.0.3+set kmInst to system attribute "KMINSTANCE"tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine"	set kmPath to getvariable "local__Path" instance kmInstend tell-- Expand tilde (~) Pathstell application "System Events"	set thePP_Path to POSIX path of disk item kmPathend tell-- Convert POSIX path to Macintosh path (path delimited with colons)set theA_Path to POSIX file thePP_Path as stringtell application "Finder"	activate	tell front window to set its target to theA_Pathend tell
